CustomField.description: The date on which sending auto-reminder and auto-overdue letters for this form was suspended. Note that such letters are also stopped when the form instance is no longer pending.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The date on which sending auto-reminder and auto-overdue letters for this form was suspended. Note that such letters are also stopped when the form instance is no longer pending.
CustomField.label: Date auto-reminders paused
